name: Kids Puzzle: Animals Jigsaw
description: Let your kids develop their skills while having fun! Kids Puzzle is a multi-level puzzle game that resembles old-school wooden puzzles but with a modern look. The touch system has been optimized for toddlers, young childrenand preschoolers.   Level 1 entirely free!  Level 2 and 3 require more skills and bring even greater fun.  Additional puzzles will be released on a regular basis.  NO Ads!  No obscure permissions!  Please report any bug or compatibility issue.
